function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Interrupted or delayed access to healthcare due to pandemic control measures","Impact":"Consequences for prevention and treatment of acute and chronic diseases","Mitigation":"Improve telemedicine and digital healthcare services, prioritize essential health services","Technologies":"Telemedicine, digital healthcare platforms","People":"Patients, especially in low- and middle-income countries","Owner":"Healthcare providers, policymakers"},{"Description":"Decreased hospital admissions for non-COVID related diseases","Impact":"Decreased treatment for heart diseases and potential increase in major infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Ensure access to non-COVID healthcare, prioritize emergency and essential care","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring devices","People":"Patients with non-COVID related diseases","Owner":"Healthcare providers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Negative psycho-social effects of prolonged NPIs","Impact":"Increase in mental diseases and domestic violence","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support, promote safe channels for reporting domestic violence","Technologies":"Teletherapy, mental health apps, domestic violence hotlines","People":"Individuals under NPIs","Owner":"Public health authorities, mental health professionals"}]}
